ygData.subject: question about rebreather...
ygData.msgSnippet: so at what skill lvl do everyone start attempting making rebreathers?  with after another 5k down the drain (upping my skill from 105 to 106), i m starting to
ygData.messageBody:
so at what skill lvl do everyone start attempting making
rebreathers? with after another 5k down the drain (upping
my skill from 105 to 106), i'm starting to doubt if i'll
ever recover my spendings with this skill...(or even to just
break even). i was hoping to try out rebreather after skill
of 120...but 5k for 1 skill point...seems kinda ridiculous.

any words of encouragement here..?
thx.

Maruk
Tinker Master of Bertoxxulous.
(prolly the only one too, sigh)
